text: Na'ankure Ava'nagnazanema nehaza agupofima fore'ma hania zamofonkna Monafi hankavenentake sondia vahe'mofo Anumzamo'a huhampri ante'neankino, ana knama esigeno'a vahe'mo'za kezankege nehu'za agasasankemo'ma hania zankura koro nehanageno, ha' vahe'mo'za e'za kuma kegina eme tapage nehanage'za, agonaramintega kezati anagamu atregahaze.
